dict.acceptation: 更，更多；达到或处于更大的范围或程度；此外，更加；
更多的；（many）的比较级；附加的，额外的；
更多的或附加的人或事物；

sent.orig: As he talked with more and more gusto, we came more and more under his spell.
sent.trans: 他越说越起劲，大家越听越入神。

sent.orig: The more they receive, the more they want. They will never be satisfied.; hanker for more; Having got Gansu, he aspires after Sichuan.; Much will have more.
sent.trans: 他们得陇望蜀，永远无法使他们心满意足。

sent.orig: More people mean a greater ferment of ideas, more enthusiasm and more energy.
sent.trans: 人多议论多， 热气高，干劲大。

sent.orig: Age stole onward and benumbed me more and more.
sent.trans: 年纪渐老使得我（反应）越来越迟钝。

sent.orig: Colour TV has been more aggressively promoted as more manufacturers have joined the competition.
sent.trans: 由于更多的厂商参与竞争，推销彩色电视机的宣传更为激烈了。
